Description: Fatigue crack at column-pontoon connection bracket due to wave-induced cyclic loading
Mitigation: Weld toe grinding; DFF=10 at critical joints; regular inspection

Description: High SCF at corners of open channel leading to crack initiation
Mitigation: 5 m corner radius; 40 mm doubler plates; post-weld treatment

Description: Strand jack gantry beam exceeds design load during dynamic lift
Mitigation: Utilization ratio 0.24; load cells on each jack with auto-stop at 110%

Description: Multi-year ice thicker than 1.5 m contacts hull
Mitigation: Ice management vessels; real-time ice monitoring; route planning

Description: Natural pitch period 15.7 s within wave energy band
Mitigation: Mass redistribution to increase kyy; column base damping plates

Description: Water column oscillation at Tn=21.6 s excited by long-period swell
Mitigation: 6 perforated damping plates; end barriers; active pump control

Description: Wave resonance n=2 at T=9.2 s amplifies wave action in channel
Mitigation: End cofferdams; operational heading control to avoid beam seas

Description: Roll excitation at 2× roll natural period under specific wave conditions
Mitigation: Anti-roll tanks; DP heading control; Tn_roll/Tp ratio monitoring

Description: One strand jack fails during lift operation
Mitigation: 27 remaining jacks redistribute load; hot standby units available

Description: Two or more strand jacks on one side fail simultaneously
Mitigation: Independent hydraulic circuits; DP3 separation philosophy for power

Description: Active heave compensation system fails while submarine suspended
Mitigation: Passive spring backup; auto-lock on failure; abort protocol

Description: One lift cable fails under tension
Mitigation: 5.0 SF on cables; NDE inspection every 200 hrs; load monitoring

Description: Sling passes under hull breaks during lift
Mitigation: 1.39 SF; pre-lift NDE; 12 sling pairs for redundancy

Description: Corroded submarine hull fails under sling loads
Mitigation: Pre-lift ROV survey; UT thickness; distributed sling loading; slow lift

Description: Submarine embedded deeper than expected requiring more force
Mitigation: 140% breakout force margin; suction/jetting to loosen sediment

Description: One or more buoyancy pontoons fail during Mode B lift
Mitigation: 18 pontoons provide 3.5% net buoyancy margin; ROV monitoring

Description: Geometry change in K-27 VT-1 reactor leads to uncontrolled fission
Mitigation: Gimbal cradle ±1°; neutron monitors; boron injection; no water ingress

Description: Cs-137 or other radionuclides leak from reactor into moon pool water
Mitigation: Pool isolation gates; contaminated water treatment (DF>10^4); discharge monitoring

Description: Volatile fission products released during reactor bay operations
Mitigation: HEPA + charcoal ventilation; negative pressure bay; CAMs; auto-shutdown

Description: Personnel exceed 20 mSv/yr dose limit
Mitigation: Shielding (10+ TVL); EPDs; ALARA programme; remote handling

Description: Nuclear torpedo warhead damaged during handling releasing alpha emitters
Mitigation: Alpha monitoring; glove box handling; HEPA; sealed torpedo bay

Description: Complete loss of DP capability due to power failure
Mitigation: DP3 redundancy; 4 engine rooms; UPS; auto-restart; mooring backup

Description: DP system error commands thrusters to move platform off station
Mitigation: Triple-redundant DP computers; operator override; auto-detect logic

Description: Thruster draws air due to wave action reducing effective thrust
Mitigation: 9 m submergence at operating draft; auto-power reduction at low draft

Description: Loss of multiple position reference systems simultaneously
Mitigation: 6 independent references (3 DGPS + 2 HPR + 1 taut wire)

Description: One main generator trips during operations
Mitigation: 6 generators; any 4 sufficient for peak demand; auto-load sharing

Description: Fire in engine room containing 2 generators
Mitigation: 4 separated engine rooms; CO2 flooding; auto fire detection

Description: MGO contaminated causing engine damage
Mitigation: Dual centrifugal separators; fuel testing; settling tanks

Description: Progressive flooding beyond one compartment
Mitigation: Watertight subdivision; high-capacity bilge pumps; cross-flooding system

Description: Unable to compensate for submarine weight during surface break
Mitigation: 8 main + 4 emergency pumps; gravity deballast backup; slow lift speed

Description: Asymmetric load causes list > 5°
Mitigation: Computerised ballast control; real-time inclinometer feedback

Description: Storm arrives during lift operations
Mitigation: 48-hr forecast monitoring; abort/lower procedure; survival draft capability

Description: Work-class ROV becomes unrecoverable at depth
Mitigation: 4 ROVs (2 primary + 2 backup); tether management system

Risk_Title: Submarine shifts on cradle during transit
Description: Lashing failure allows submarine movement on deck
Mitigation: 24 steel stoppers + chain lashings; strain gauge monitoring; speed reduction

Description: Fuel or hydraulic oil release to sea
Mitigation: Double-bottom fuel tanks; containment coamings; SOPEP plan; 20 m³ spill kit

Description: Treated water discharge exceeds limits
Mitigation: Continuous discharge monitoring; auto-shutoff at >1 Bq/L; holding tanks

Description: Construction takes >48 months
Mitigation: 6-month schedule float; critical path monitoring; Korean yard selection

Description: Final cost exceeds $2.9B estimate
Mitigation: 20% contingency; fixed-price contracts where possible; value engineering

Description: Helicopter crash during crew transfer
Mitigation: CAP 437 helideck compliance; weather minimums; IFR-equipped aircraft

Description: Multiple personnel injured/killed in accident
Mitigation: Safety management system; emergency response plan; medevac capability

Description: National government revokes access permission
Mitigation: International treaty framework; IAEA sponsorship; diplomatic engagement

Description: Platform targeted by hostile actors during nuclear operations
Mitigation: Naval escort; exclusion zone; security team; encrypted communications
